title: Carbon Royale Watch Face
summary: Handcrafted from durable Carbon fiber mesh and carefully selected metal alloys.
description: Watch Face Features:* Tap Gear icon to change Color Accent * Crown of the King (Unicode Chess Symbol)* Tap the Symbol to change it from a List* Optimized for minimal Battery usage* Exquisite hybrid Design Language* Classic 12-hour analogue Hands* Digital 24-hour military Clock* Localized Day of Week, Day of Month* Optional full color Ambient Mode for LCD* Burn-in Protection for OLED Screens* Accurate Battery Gauge at 6 o'clock* Unique Black Forest Movement* All hands are ticking, not sweeping* Tiny animation beneath the battery level* Looks good on Square and Round Watches* Android Wear smart watch required.
descriptionHTML:
Watch Face Features:

* Tap Gear icon to change Color Accent
* Crown of the King (Unicode Chess Symbol)
* Tap the Symbol to change it from a List
* Optimized for minimal Battery usage
* Exquisite hybrid Design Language
* Classic 12-hour analogue Hands
* Digital 24-hour military Clock
* Localized Day of Week, Day of Month
* Optional full color Ambient Mode for LCD
* Burn-in Protection for OLED Screens
* Accurate Battery Gauge at 6 o'clock
* Unique Black Forest Movement
* All hands are ticking, not sweeping
* Tiny animation beneath the battery level
* Looks good on Square and Round Watches
* Android Wear smart watch required.
recentChanges: * Tap the Symbol, it's interactive now.
